price: (61) And Allāh will save those who feared Him by their attainment;[1357] no evil will touch them, nor will they grieve.
arabic: وَيُنَجِّي ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوۡاْ بِمَفَازَتِهِمۡ لَا يَمَسُّهُمُ ٱلسُّوٓءُ وَلَا هُمۡ يَحۡزَنُونَ
footnotes: [1357]- i.e., their success in the trials of worldly life and attainment of Paradise.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wayunajjī al-lahu alladhīna ittaqaw bimafāzatihim lā yamassuhumu al-sūu walā hum yaḥzanūna
